item.title: Emmys winners list for 2025: Live updates
item.description: The 2025 Emmy Awards are honoring the best in television. See the full list of winners and nominees.

item.title: 2 arrested after incendiary device placed under news vehicle in Salt Lake City
item.description: The device had been lit but "failed to function as designed," a Unified Fire Authority Investigations officer wrote in affidavits of probable cause.

item.title: California Legislature passes bill banning most law enforcement from wearing face masks
item.description: If signed into law by California Gov. Gavin Newsom, it would apply to most local and federal law enforcement officers.

item.title: 9/14: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect not cooperating with authorities, sources say; The last video store in San Francisco

item.title: 9/10: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Breaking down the reaction to fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk; Reporter's Notebook: Kamala Harris on Biden's reelection campaign
